cluster_information.name: Device Energy Management Mode
cluster_information.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster, defining additional mode tags and namespaced enumerated values for Device Energy Management devices.

derived_datatypes.name: ModeTag
derived_datatypes.description: The derived cluster specific ModeTag values.

enum_values.name: NoOptimization
enum_values.description: The device prohibits optimization of energy usage management: its energy usage is determined only by the user configuration and internal device needs. This tag cannot be included with any of the other tags defined below in a mode.

enum_values.name: DeviceOptimization
enum_values.description: The device is permitted to manage its own energy usage. For example, using tariff information it may obtain.

enum_values.name: LocalOptimization
enum_values.description: The device permits management of energy usage by an energy manager to optimize the local energy usage.

enum_values.name: GridOptimization
enum_values.description: The device permits management of energy usage by an energy manager to optimize the grid energy usage.

mode_constraints.description: The table below lists the changes relative to the Mode Base cluster for the fields of the ModeOptionStruct type.
